name: Xdm.org
body:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/xdmspec/xdm.org/master/images/xdm.png)

The eXtensible Device Metadata (XDM) specification is a standard for storing device-related metadata in common image containers such as JPEG and PNG while maintaining compatibility with existing image viewers.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
